message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you 40% of the money. Accept and we can finish the game.
I think it's more fair to split the money evenly.  Accept this offer and we can move on.
I don't think an even split is fair, considering the inflation. My offer was already generous, and now it's even less valuable. I'll make a new offer.
Considering the inflation, I'll give you a slightly smaller share this round. But I think this is a fair compromise.
